Message.Msg: "The failed watch seller still lurks in the shadows looking for long lost friends who are no longer with us." Precisely. The poor soul is still very very much alone! Up here again on a Friday night while the rest of us are out continually forging intimate relations. All alone and nasty. Forever. How does that help? IT doesn't. Buy goog and sail smoothly, people! -Sully Rules
